name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prog.AI: in-depth insights on 60 million software engineers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prog.AI enables recruiters to see in-depth details on software engineers, and build bulk list of candidates quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prog.AI builds deep technical profiles for software engineers by connecting data from GitHub and LinkedIn. Score skills of software engineers based on their actual work!

Prog.AI builds profiles for 60 million software developers worldwide integrating the information from GitHub, LinkedIn, Stackoverflow and adding contact details. Technical recruiters use Prog.AI sourcing platform to source hard-to-find talent.

Recruiters use Prog.AI Chrome Extension FOR FREE to get in-depth insights on software developers that LinkedIn profiles don't have. When viewing a profile on LinkedIn, or using LinkedIn Recruiter, Prog.AI extension shows technical skills, GitHub projects, Likely-to-Moveâ„¢ score, contact details and other useful insights. Similarly, when browsing GitHub profiles and projects, use the extension to get software engineers' contacts and LinkedIn information. 

If you have any questions, email us at support@getprog.ai

Ideal for:

Tech recruiters searching for specialized software engineering talent.
Hiring managers looking to streamline the recruitment process.
Companies aiming to build strong tech teams with top-tier developers.
